dct_title_s: Map of the Colony and Protectorate of Nigeria, 1930
dct_description_sm: Map shows international, provincial, and mandated territory boundaries, provincial and divisional headquarters, and railways in operation and under construction. The Colony area is indicated by red color. "1930 (342-G.P.370/5)." Original map is filed in the Map and Geospatial Information Center, a map reproduction is attached to companion volume. Crown Copyright Reserved. Original map is filed in the Map and Geospatial Information Center. A map reproduction is attached to companion volume. "(342-6.P.370/5)."
